data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea obovata (Sibirean spruce) from sample VISHERPO-252

Slope 0 deg, Geology: Torfh. podsol, lehm. Tonbode, Tree line 680 m, av. Tree height 24 m, Tree cover 80%, Shrub cover 3%, Herb cover 80%, Moss cover 90%, Vegatation type: Piceetum sphagnoso-myrtillosum, Film number: 971A
